question: in plutarch enterprises , 60 % of the employees are marketers , 30 % are engineers , and the rest are managers . marketers make an average salary of $ 50,000 a year , and engineers make an average of $ 80,000 . what is the average salary for managers if the average for all employees is also $ 80,000 ?

if greg buys 5 shirts , 4 trousers and 2 ties , the total cost is $ 80 . if greg buys 7 shirts , 4 trousers and 2 ties , the total cost is $ 70 . how much will it cost him to buy 2 trousers , 3 shirts and 1 ties ?
for any integer n greater than 1 , # n denotes the product of all the integers from 1 to n , inclusive . how many prime numbers w are there between # 6 + 2 and # 6 + 6 , inclusive ?

a car ferry can hold up to 70 tons of cargo . what is the greatest number of vehicles that the ferry can carry if half the vehicles are cars with an average ( arithmetic mean ) weight of 0.75 tons and half of the vehicles are trucks with an average ( arithmetic mean ) weight of 5 tons ?

if xerox paper costs 5 cents a sheet and a buyer gets 10 % discount on all xerox paper one buys after the first 2000 papers and 20 % discount after first 10000 papers , how much will it cost to buy 45000 sheets of xerox paper ?
how many of the positive factors of 36 are not factors of 72

darcy lives 1.5 miles from work . she can walk to work at a constant rate of 3 miles per hour , or she can ride the train to work at a constant rate of 20 miles per hour . if she rides the train , there is an additional x minutes spent walking to the nearest train station , waiting for the train , and walking from the final train station to her work . if it takes darcy a total of 20 more minutes to commute to work by walking than it takes her to commute to work by riding the train , what is the value of x ?
a certain industrial loom weaves 0.132 meters of cloth every second . approximately how many seconds will it take for the loom to weave 15 meters of cloth ?

in an examination , 300 students appeared . out of these students ; 28 % got first division , 54 % got second division and the remaining just passed . assuming that no student failed ; find the number of students who just passed .
if each edge of cube increased by 10 % , the percentage increase in surface area is :
a seller of used cars has 18 cars to sell and each of his clients selected 3 cars that he liked most . if each car was selected exactly thrice , how many clients visited the garage ?
what is the area of a square field whose diagonal of length 28 m ?
a and b together can do a work in 6 days . if a alone can do it in 42 days . in how many days can b alone do it ?
when 52416 is divided by 312 , the quotient is 168 . what will be the quotient when 522.416 is divided by 0.0168 ?

in a certain company , the ratio of the number of managers to the number of non - managers in any department must always be greater than 7 : 24 . in the company , what is the maximum number of non - managers in a department that has 8 managers ?
gopi gives rs . 90 plus one turban as salary to his servant for one year . the servant leaves after 9 months and receives rs . 45 and the turban . find the price of the turban .
david obtained 96 , 95 , 82 , 97 and 95 marks ( out of 100 ) in english , mathematics , physics , chemistry and biology what are his average marks ?

the diagonal of a rhombus are 62 m and 80 m . its area is :
what is the remainder when 1271 * 1275 * 1279 * 1285 is divided by 12 ?

in a certain game , each player scores either 2 points or 5 points . if n players score 2 points and m players score 5 points , and the total number of points scored is 50 , what is the least possible positive e difference between n and m ?
if there is an equal probability of a child being born a boy or a girl , what is the probability that a couple who have 7 children have two children of the same sex and one of the opposite sex ?
what is the least value of x . so that 23 x 57 is divisible by 3 .
a person lent a certain sum of money at 4 % per annum at simple interest and in 8 years the interest amounted to rs . 340 less than the sum lent . what was the sum lent ?
in a primary school , the ratio of the number of girls to boys is 5 : 8 . if there are 160 girls , the total number of students in the college is :

apple street begins at peach street and runs directly east for 3.2 kilometers until it ends when it meets cherry street . apple street is intersected every 200 meters by a perpendicular street , and each of those streets other than peach street and cherry street is given a number beginning at 1 st street ( one block east of peach street ) and continuing consecutively ( 2 nd street , 3 rd street , etc . . . ) until the highest - numbered street one block west of cherry street . what is the highest - numbered street that intersects apple street ?

angelina walked 600 meters from her home to the grocery at a constant speed . she then walked 480 meters to the gym at double the speed . she spent 40 seconds less on her way from the grocery to the gym than on her way from home to the grocery . what was angelina ' s speed , in meters per second , from the grocery to the gym ?
roja and pooja start moving in the opposite directions from a pole . they are moving at the speeds of 6 km / hr and 3 km / hr respectively . after 4 hours what will be the distance between them ?
a bag contains 7 red , 9 blue and 5 green balls . if 3 balls are picked at random , what is the probability that both are red ?

a container holding 12 ounces of a solution that is 1 part alcohol to 2 parts water is added to a container holding 9 ounces of a solution that is 1 part alcohol to 2 parts water . what is the ratio of alcohol to water in the resulting solution ?
in the xy - coordinate system , what is the slope of the line that goes through the point ( 1 , 1 ) and is equidistant from the two points p = ( 3 , 7 ) and q = ( 9 , 11 ) ?

a marketing firm determined that , of 200 households surveyed , 80 used neither brand w nor brand b soap , 60 used only brand w soap , and for every household that used both brands of soap , 3 used only brand b soap . how many of the 200 households surveyed used both brands of soap ?
a sells a cricket bat to b at a profit of 20 % . b sells it to c at a profit of 25 % . if c pays $ 225 for it , the cost price of the cricket bat for a is :

tim came second in math . when his mother asked him how much he had scored , he answered that he got the sum of the first 7 even numbers . his mother immediately worked out the answer . how much had he scored in math ?
a and b are two circles . the radius of a is four times as large as the diameter of b . what is the ratio between the areas of the circles ?
if the simple interest on $ 1500 increase by $ 20 , when the time increase by 2 years . find the rate percent per annum .

a person bought 114 glass bowls at a rate of rs . 13 per bowl . he sold 108 of them at rs . 17 and the remaining broke . what is the percentage gain for a ?
find the perimeter and area of a square of side 13 cm .
if y is 75 % greater than x , than x is what % less than y ?

a person spent rs . 5,040 from his salary on food and 5,000 on house rent . after that he was left with 20 % of his monthly salary . what is his monthly salary ?
for a certain exam , a score of 58 was 2 standard deviations below mean and a score of 98 was 3 standard deviations above mean . what was the mean score w for the exam ?
a train 100 m long can cross an electric pole in 20 sec and then find the speed of the train ?
when you draw 2 dices together , find the probability of getting a total of 6 ?
12 buckets of water fill a tank when the capacity of each bucket is 81 litres . how many buckets will be needed to fill the same tank , if the capacity of each bucket is 9 litres ?
